headline: OERLIKON LEYBOLD ROOTS PUMPING SYSTEM 118 CFM
keywords: roots blowers stacks pump stacks blower packages
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pumping Systems
specstable:
Manufacturer Oerlikon Leybold
Model D40B/WSU251
Pumping Speed 118.0 CFM (3,334.4 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 2.00E-5(En) torr (2.67E-5 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 63.0 mm (2.480 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Backing Pump Model TRIVAC D40B
Roots Pump Model RUVAC WSU 251
Motor Horsepower 3.5 HP
Accessories The D40B has an AF 40-65 exhaust filter (p/n 18916)
and a CF 40-65 chemical oil filter (p/n 10197)
Other Information Oil Capacity: 3.5 qts
Power Requirements (WSU 251): 200/460 V; 5.5/3.2 A; 50/60 Hz
Power Requirements (D40B): 200-240/380-480 V; 12/5.2 A; 50/60 Hz
Extended Description Details at Oerlikon Leybold WAU251 D40B_WSU251 D40B.pdf
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 24.000 in (61.0 cm)
Depth 36.000 in (91.4 cm)
Height 36.000 in (91.4 cm)
Weight 500 lb (227 kg)
